AT.name: Castlevania Dracula X
AT.description: Dracula ist erneut auferstanden, hat seine dunklen Diener um sich geschart und die Freundin von Richter Belmont entführt, um den Helden in seinen Untergang zu locken. Als Richter, Nachkomme des ursprünglichen Vampirjägers Simon Belmont, greifst du zur legendären Peitsche und nimmst den Kampf gegen die Bewohner von Draculas Schloss auf. Verwende mächtige Waffen und mystische Power-Ups, entdecke geheime Bonuslevel und stell dich in sieben Leveln der höllischen Action. Mach der Familie Belmont alle Ehre und verwandele Dracula in ein Häufchen Staub! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Castlevania Dracula X
AU.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer, Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula’s castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups, and discover secret bonus levels, as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Castlevania Dracula X
BG.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer, Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula’s castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups, and discover secret bonus levels, as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Castlevania Dracula X
BE.description: Dracula est une fois de plus ressuscité et a fait appel à ses effrayants sbires pour capturer la petite amie de Richter Belmont, afin d'attirer celui-ci dans ses filets. Incarnez Richter, le descendant du fameux tueur de vampire Simon Belmont, brandissez votre fouet légendaire et affrontez les résidents du château de Dracula. À travers sept niveaux d'action terrifiants, utilisez vos puissantes armes et vos améliorations mystiques, et découvrez des niveaux bonus secrets. Faites honneur à la lignée des Belmont et réduisez Dracula en poussière ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Castlevania Dracula X
ES.description: Tras resurgir una vez más, el conde Drácula ha reunido a sus diabólicos secuaces y ha capturado a la novia de Richter Belmont con el solo objetivo de acabar con nuestro héroe. Métete en la piel de este descendiente del primer cazavampiros, Simon Belmont, y empuña el látigo legendario. Lucha contra los moradores del castillo de Drácula, usa armas poderosas y mejoras místicas, y descubre fases secretas a medida que recorres siete niveles repletos de acción. Deja tu impronta en el linaje de los Belmont ¡y reduce a Drácula a cenizas! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Castlevania Dracula X
IT.description: Il conte Dracula è risorto dalle tenebre chiamando a raccolta i suoi oscuri seguaci! Questa volta ha rapito la fidanzata di Richter Belmont con il solo obiettivo di togliere di mezzo il nostro eroe una volta per tutte. Vesti i panni di Richter, erede del leggendario ammazzavampiri Belmont, impugna la frusta mistica e stermina le creature che popolano il castello di Dracula. Attraversa sette livelli d'azione infernale sfoderando potenti armi e potenziamenti soprannaturali. Dimostra di essere all'altezza della tua stirpe e trasforma il signore dei vampiri in cenere! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Castlevania Dracula X
NL.description: Dracula is herrezen. Ontboden onderdanen die onder zijn leiding staan hebben de vriendin van Richter Belmont ontvoerd in de hoop hem naar zijn ondergang te lokken. Richter, nakomeling van Dracula-doder Simon Belmont, hanteert de legendarische zweep en levert strijd met de bewoners van Dracula’s kasteel. Gebruik machtige wapens en mystieke vaardigheden, en ontdek geheime bonuslevels in je tocht door zeven helse levels bomvol actie. Treed in de voetsporen van eerder Belmont’s en versla Dracula! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Castlevania Dracula X
NZ.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer, Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula’s castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups, and discover secret bonus levels, as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Castlevania Dracula X
PL.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer, Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula’s castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups, and discover secret bonus levels, as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Castlevania Dracula X
PT.description: Dracula regressou das trevas uma vez mais, reuniu os seus súbditos demoníacos e capturou a amada de Richter Belmont com o único objetivo de a utilizar como engodo para destruir o nosso herói de uma vez por todas. Na pele de Richter, descendente do caçador de vampiros original, Simon Belmont, empunha o lendário chicote e luta contra os habitantes do castelo de Dracula. Utiliza armas poderosas e power-ups místicos e descobre níveis secretos de bónus, à medida que te aventuras através de sete níveis infernais. Deixa a tua marca na linhagem Belmont e reduz o Dracula a cinzas! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Castlevania Dracula X
RU.description: Жестокому графу Dracula не по нраву загробная жизнь: он снова вернулся в мир живых, призвал на помощь служителей зла и похитил возлюбленную главного героя Richter Belmont, чтобы заманить того в смертельную ловушку. Richter — потомок прославленного охотника на вампиров Simon Belmont. Вооружившись фамильным кнутом, он отправляется в замок Dracula. Помогите ему найти мощное оружие и волшебные зелья, пройти семь уровней замка, населенного нечистью, и открыть тайные уровни. Впишите свою страницу в историю славного рода Belmont и превратите Dracula в кучку праха! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer, Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula’s castle.
